description: Application to vary Condition 8 (BREEAM) of planning permission ref: P2014/4884/S73 dated 3 March 2015 for 'Application for Variation of Condition 2 (approved plans) of Planning Permission P2013/0063/FUL dated 09/10/2014 for 'Demolition of existing garages, Oil tank building and 10 no. single storey bedsit units. Proposed building of 12 new single storey houses and one two storey house. Refurbishment of three garages to provide cycle store and mobility store. New lumber store in converted store. New landscape proposals for improvement of pedestrian areas, parking, planting, lighting and security. PV panel installation on roof of Emberton Court.' The variation consists of amendment of BREEAM value to 'Very Good'.
decision_conditions: By reason that the proposal would not meet the minimum requirements to provide a BREEAM Domestic Refurbishment rating of 'Excellent', the proposal would not provide adequate sustainability measures and would be contrary to policy DM7.4 of the Development Management Policies 2013, policy CS10 of the Core Strategy 2011, policy 5.3 of the London Plan and the guidance set out in Islington's Environmental Design Planning Guidance (2012).
